knimeNode.name: Function Creator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows the user to create a scalar function.

fullDescription.intro: Allows the user to create a scalar function. This function can be fitted to data with the "Function Fitting" and "Interactive Function Fitting" nodes.
fullDescription.option: The dependent variable and the function expression.
One or more independent variables. All symbols that are not checked are used as function parameters.
